message_success_start.en:
Hello! I am a book reading bot.
Just send me a book file in .epub format, and you can start reading.
I will remind you about your book every day by sending a small excerpt at 20:20.
You can stop reminders with the /stop_auto command.
To upload poems, enable /poem_mode.
For help, use /help.
To change the language, use /change_lang.

message_file_added.en:
üìö Your file has been queued for processing!
‚è±Ô∏è This will take a few minutes
üìñ You will receive a notification when the book is ready to read
For help use /help

error_file_adding_failed.en: Error! I failed with saving file. Try again

error_current_book.en: I do not know your current book

error_book_recognition.en:
Error! I do not recognize this book name.
Choose one from /my_books
For more info use /help

error_user_finding.en: Sorry, did not find you in users. Try command /start

error_lang_recognition.en: Sorry, did not recognize this language. Please choose one from keyboard /change_lang

message_poem_mode_ON.en: Poem mode is ON. Please send a book file

message_poem_mode_OFF.en: Poem mode is OFF. Please send a book file

message_book_finished.en:
Congratulations! The book is finished.
Start already uploaded /my_books
Or send a new .epub file.

message_dont_understand.en:
I did not understand the command {}.
If you want to read a book, just send me an .epub file.
See available commands with /help

message_lang_changed.en:
Success! Language has been changed.
See commands at /help

message_choose_book.en:
------
Choose the book for start reading

message_help.en:
I will help you read books right here in Telegram!

Just send me an .epub file and you can start reading.

I will remind you about your book every day at 20:20 by sending a small excerpt. To stop reminders, use /stop_auto. To get the next part, use /more.

If you want to read poetry, activate the special mode with /poem_mode before uploading the file.

All available commands are on the keyboard below the input field.

Happy reading!

Change language: /change_lang
